title: Looking for people to play with in Normals
body:
Hi, just looking for friendly people who likes to play LoL just for fun. I don't really mind what level you are nor what ranked you're in. Though I would prefer people who don't rage at everything and doesn't  shit talk to anyone as well.

Public chat doesn't work for me so I thought to just post here.

Anyway, if you're keen just add me ;)

replies.body: add me if you are near a computer ill be on later tonight
sent you a friend request, i'm often afk though & forget to log out
